flawed_nl_solution:
Will caught 16+10= <<16+10=26>>26 fishes
Henry caught 3 trout for each catfish Will caught so since Will caught 16 catfish, Henry caught 16*3 = <<3*16=48>>48 trout
Half of 48 trout is (1/2)*48 = 96/1
Henry returned 96/1 trout leaving him with 48-96/1 = <<48-96/1=-48>>-48 trout
They now have a total of 26+-48 = <<26+-48=-22>>-22 fishes

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 96/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
